jobs.name: daily-content-command-center
jobs.description: Daily competitor scan + content plan + publish pack (direct orchestrator)

payload.message:
Run the Daily Content Command Center workflow autonomously.

Goal:
- Scan top competitors across YouTube, X/Twitter, LinkedIn, and Reddit.
- Identify outlier content (posts/videos performing above usual baseline).
- Summarize what is working: hooks, formats, topics, angles, CTA patterns, and timing.
- Generate personalized daily content plan in my style.

Required outputs:
1) Competitor outlier summary (top findings with links)
2) Daily idea set:
- 1 YouTube idea (title + hook + outline)
- 1 short-form idea for TikTok/Reels (hook + beats)
- 1 LinkedIn post draft
- 1 newsletter angle + short draft
3) Priority plan for today (what to publish first and why)
4) Automation opportunities: one new automation idea to save time

Publish pack:
- Save files to /Users/bilal/.openclaw/agents/orchestrator/workspace/publish/latest/
- Write/update:
  - blog.md
  - linkedin.md
  - x-thread.md
  - email.md

Delivery:
- Return concise daily briefing suitable for WhatsApp reading.
- Include source links for key findings.

state.lastError: Error: cron: job execution timed out

payload.message:
Run the Evening Content Recap and Tomorrow Planner workflow autonomously.

Goal:
- Review today's competitor/content signals and summarize what changed since morning.
- Produce a concise end-of-day performance and opportunity brief.
- Create an actionable plan for tomorrow's content execution.

Required outputs:
1) Evening recap:
- New outliers since morning
- What topics/formats accelerated today
- What likely underperformed and why
2) Tomorrow plan:
- Top 3 content opportunities with rationale
- 1 YouTube concept (title + opening hook)
- 1 short-form concept (hook + shot/beat outline)
- 1 LinkedIn draft post
- 1 newsletter angle and subject line
3) Execution checklist for tomorrow morning (priority order)
4) One optimization recommendation for improving the automation pipeline

Publish pack updates:
- Save/update files in /Users/bilal/.openclaw/agents/orchestrator/workspace/publish/latest/
- blog.md, linkedin.md, x-thread.md, email.md

Delivery:
- Return concise WhatsApp-friendly briefing with links.
Generate a concise morning briefing with exactly 4 sections: YESTERDAY WINS, TODAY TOP 3, PENDING DECISIONS, GROWTH IDEA. Under 220 words. Bullet points only. No web browsing. No follow-up questions.

jobs.name: midnight-daily-tracker
jobs.description: Midnight daily tracker + memory update (fast path)

payload.message: Create end-of-day tracker with sections COMPLETED, DECISIONS, BLOCKERS, INSIGHTS. Keep under 220 words. Then append only high-signal durable facts to memory. No web browsing. No follow-up questions.

jobs.name: weekly-trend-analysis
jobs.description: Weekly trend scan across Reddit, YouTube, X

payload.message:
Run weekly trend analysis for my niche and produce:
1) TOP 5 TRENDING TOPICS
2) 3 CONTENT IDEAS ranked by potential
3) 2 LEAD MAGNET CONCEPTS
4) AUDIENCE PAIN POINTS

Use Reddit + YouTube + X signals. Return concise report with source links.
Generate a concise morning briefing with exactly 4 sections: YESTERDAY WINS, TODAY TOP 3, PENDING DECISIONS, GROWTH IDEA. Under 120 words.
Create end-of-day tracker with COMPLETED, DECISIONS, BLOCKERS, INSIGHTS under 120 words.
Run this command directly: /bin/bash /Users/bilal/.openclaw/scripts/self_heal.sh . Return 3-line status only.
